languages.text: {n}Власть Инквизиции велика, но даже она предпочитает не приказывать Астартес, а просить. Космические волки не числятся в рядах близких друзей Инквизиции. Тем страннее, что на призыв Орден направил не один, а целых два отряда, каждый из которых способен справиться с планетарным мятежом.{/n}

{n}Though it wields immense power, when it comes to the Astartes, even the Inquisition chooses to make requests rather than commands. The Space Wolves are not known for being close allies of the Inquisition. How strange, then, that the Chapter sent not one but two squads in response to this request, when one squad alone is capable of crushing a planetary uprising.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Власть Инквизиции велика, но даже она предпочитает не приказывать Астартес, а просить. Космические волки не числятся в рядах близких друзей Инквизиции. Тем страннее, что на призыв Орден направил не один, а целых два отряда, каждый из которых способен справиться с планетарным мятежом.{/n}

The Space Wolves are not known for being close allies of the Inquisition. How strange, then, that the Chapter sent not one but two squads in response to this request, when one squad alone is capable of crushing a planetary uprising.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管审判庭拥有巨大的权力，但如果对方是阿斯塔特修士，那即便是审判庭，也不会以命令的形式提出要求，而是以请求的方式期望达成合作。众所周知，太空野狼与审判庭的关系一向不睦。既然如此，这就很奇怪了。明明一支小队就完全足以粉碎行星上的叛乱，战团却派出了两支小队来执行审判庭的请求。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Though it wields immense power, when it comes to the Astartes, even the Inquisition chooses to make requests rather than commands. The Space Wolves are not known for being close allies of the Inquisition. How strange, then, that the Chapter sent not one but two squads in response to this request, when one squad alone is capable of crushing a planetary uprising.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管审判庭拥有巨大的权力，但如果对方是阿斯塔特修士，那即便是审判庭，也不会以命令的形式提出要求，而是以请求的方式期望达成合作。众所周知，太空野狼与审判庭的关系一向不睦。既然如此，这就很奇怪了。明明一支小队就完全足以粉碎行星上的叛乱，战团却派出了两支小队来执行审判庭的请求。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aunque el poder de la Inquisición es inmenso, incluso sus miembros se limitan a enviar solicitudes y no órdenes a los Astartes. Los Lobos Espaciales no son precisamente íntimos amigos de la Inquisición, por lo que resulta extraño que el Capítulo enviara no una sino dos unidades en respuesta a esta petición cuando con una unidad es suficiente para sofocar una rebelión planetaria.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Though it wields immense power, when it comes to the Astartes, even the Inquisition chooses to make requests rather than commands. The Space Wolves are not known for being close allies of the Inquisition. How strange, then, that the Chapter sent not one but two squads in response to this request, when one squad alone is capable of crushing a planetary uprising.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aunque el poder de la Inquisición es inmenso, incluso sus miembros se limitan a enviar solicitudes y no órdenes a los Astartes. Los Lobos Espaciales no son precisamente íntimos amigos de la Inquisición, por lo que resulta extraño que el Capítulo enviara no una sino dos unidades en respuesta a esta petición cuando con una unidad es suficiente para sofocar una rebelión planetaria.{/n}

languages.text: {n}絶大な力を振るうとはいえ、アスタルテスとなれば、異端審問庁といえども命令するよりも依頼することを選ぶ。スペースウルフは異端審問庁とはそれほど近しい仲というわけではない。ゆえに、この要請に対して戦団が1隊だけでなく2隊を派遣したのは奇妙なことだ。1隊だけで惑星の反乱を鎮圧できるはずなのだから。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Though it wields immense power, when it comes to the Astartes, even the Inquisition chooses to make requests rather than commands. The Space Wolves are not known for being close allies of the Inquisition. How strange, then, that the Chapter sent not one but two squads in response to this request, when one squad alone is capable of crushing a planetary uprising.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}絶大な力を振るうとはいえ、アスタルテスとなれば、異端審問庁といえども命令するよりも依頼することを選ぶ。スペースウルフは異端審問庁とはそれほど近しい仲というわけではない。ゆえに、この要請に対して戦団が1隊だけでなく2隊を派遣したのは奇妙なことだ。1隊だけで惑星の反乱を鎮圧できるはずなのだから。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Auch wenn sie gewaltige Macht über die Astartes ausübt, zieht die Inquisition es vor, Bitten vorzubringen statt Befehle zu erteilen. Die Space Wolves sind nicht dafür bekannt, enge Verbündete der Inquisition zu sein. Merkwürdig daher, dass der Orden als Reaktion auf diese Bitte nicht nur einen, sondern gleich zwei Trupps geschickt hat, wenn doch einer allein einen planetenweiten Aufstand niederschlagen kann.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Though it wields immense power, when it comes to the Astartes, even the Inquisition chooses to make requests rather than commands. The Space Wolves are not known for being close allies of the Inquisition. How strange, then, that the Chapter sent not one but two squads in response to this request, when one squad alone is capable of crushing a planetary uprising.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Auch wenn sie gewaltige Macht über die Astartes ausübt, zieht die Inquisition es vor, Bitten vorzubringen statt Befehle zu erteilen. Die Space Wolves sind nicht dafür bekannt, enge Verbündete der Inquisition zu sein. Merkwürdig daher, dass der Orden als Reaktion auf diese Bitte nicht nur einen, sondern gleich zwei Trupps geschickt hat, wenn doch einer allein einen planetenweiten Aufstand niederschlagen kann.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Malgré son immense pouvoir, même l'Inquisition préfère formuler des demandes plutôt que des ordres lorsqu'il est question des Astartes. Les Space Wolves ne sont pas réputés pour être de proches alliés de l'Inquisition. Il est donc troublant que le Chapitre ait envoyé non pas une, mais deux escouades en réponse à cette requête, alors qu'une seule d'entre elles suffit à mater la rébellion d'une planète.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Though it wields immense power, when it comes to the Astartes, even the Inquisition chooses to make requests rather than commands. The Space Wolves are not known for being close allies of the Inquisition. How strange, then, that the Chapter sent not one but two squads in response to this request, when one squad alone is capable of crushing a planetary uprising.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İnanılmaz bir güce sahip olsa da konu Astartes olunca Engizisyon bile emir vermek yerine ricada bulunuyor. Uzay Kurtları, Engizisyon'un sıkı müttefiklerinden değildir. Tek bir manga bile gezegensel bir ayaklanmayı bastırmaya yeterliyken Tümen'in bu talep için bir yerine iki manga göndermesi çok tuhaf.{/n}

How strange, then, that the Chapter sent not one but two squads in response to this request, when one squad alone is capable of crushing a planetary uprising.{/n}
